backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata for updating HeroSection to use a sanitized newly uploaded image.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists precomputed summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Hero, Quiz, and Closing sections with navigation.
frontend/src/components/DedicationLayout: Simple layout wrapper providing responsive container spacing.
frontend/src/components/quiz/Celebration: Overlay component rendering confetti, burst, and sparkle animations when triggered.
frontend/src/components/sections/Closing: Closing section with final message, signature, ornament, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with decorative elements and a large photo using error‑fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/LetterS: Letter section rendering multi‑paragraph dedication text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Moments: Moments section displaying a grid of memory cards with titles, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSec: Renders an interactive quiz using dedicationContent, handling answer selection, scoring, celebration effects, and result display.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection and smooth‑scroll anchors.
frontend/src/content/dedicationContent.t: Provides all static site content including hero text, quiz questions and results, letter paragraphs, and moments entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and architectural notes for building a dedication website with a hero image and interactive quiz. Tracks features, versions, and constraints for asset handling and UI behavior.
